title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Biden tells military that global warming is the biggest threat to the United States -- and that he's not joking. Rush on when Obama said global warming was the biggest threat. Rep. Andy Biggs (R-AZ): Dems campaigned on global warming. Rep. Carlos Gimenez (R-FL) on the root cause of the current border crisis: Joe Biden and Kamala Harris. Developer pulls plug on Keystone XL pipeline, more jobs killed by Biden. Tricia Burns, the owner of fitness studio, choked up over jobs lost. Rush on Keystone in 2013. Callers on Keystone and illegal immigration.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Virginia teacher blasts critical race theory, woke education on Fox News. Magazine editor writes WSJ op-ed saying he'll stop hiring Ivy League grads. Rush on how identity politics erodes free speech. Lockheed Martin defends social justice training. Caller on callers. Fauci says an attack on him is an attack on science. Senator Kennedy blasts Fauci. Huge Rush See, I Told You So on Trump on Lafayette Park, St. John's church. Immigrant caller on woke education and the Pledge of Allegiance in school.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Panic over Kamala Harris' disastrous trip. Sean Hannity on the night Rush got the Medal of Freedom. Caller on Biden and Harris. Rush at his best explaining the Drive-By Media to a caller. Jeffrey Toobin returns to CNN. EIB High Note on the meaning of teamwork. Guide host Brett Winterble signs off, talks about working for Rush and the EIB family.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
